```{r}

x <- seq(-5, 5, 0.01)
y <- -5*x**2 + x + 3 
df <- tibble(x = x, y = y)

title <- paste0("The maximum y-value of the curve is: \n", max(y))

ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = title)

```

```{r}
vals <- rnorm(1000)

sprintf('The mean is %.3f and the standard deviation is %.3f', mean(vals), sd(vals))
```
